如何とでも: (どうとでも) - one way or the other; either way
如何とも: (どうとも) - one way or the other; either way
如何な: (いっかな) - what kind of/whatever sort of; no matter what/however much
如何なく: (いかんなく) - amply; sufficiently; fully; completely; all out
如何なる: (いかなる) - (with neg. verb) any kind of
如何に: (いかに) - how/in what way; however much/however (e.g. easy, rich, sad)/whatever/how much; hey/oi
如何にかかわらず: (いかんにかかわらず) - (often XXのいかんに...) regardless of; irrespective of
如何にして: (いかにして) - how; in what way
如何にも: (どうにも) - (not) in any way; in no way
如何による: (いかんによる) - depending on the ...; to depend on the ...
如何の斯うの: (どうのこうの) - this and that; one thing or another
如何無く: (いかんなく) - amply; sufficiently; fully; completely; all out
如何物: (いかもの) - (also written 偽物)  fake/forgery/counterfeit/imitation; unusual item/something strange
如何程: (いかほど) - how much; how many; however
如何致しまして: (どういたしまして) - you are welcome; don't mention it; not at all; my pleasure
如何言う: (どういう) - somehow; how; in what way; why; what kind of
如來: (にょらい) - Tathagata; perfected one (suffix of high-ranking Buddhist deities)
如在無い: (じょさいない) - tactful; shrewd; cautious; clever; smart; adroit
如実: (にょじつ) - (usu. 如実に) reality/actuality/actual conditions/true situation/faithful representation/vivid depiction; ultimate reality/absolute truth
如実に物語る: (にょじつにものがたる) - to give a true account; to give a graphic account
如実知見: (にょじつちけん) - (yoji)  perceiving reality as it is; true awareness of reality
如意: (にょい) - one's wishes; ceremonial sceptre used by monks when reciting sutras (scepter)
如意宝珠: (にょいほうじゅ) - Cintamani stone; wish-fulfilling jewel
如意自在: (にょいじざい) - (yoji) freely; in complete control of; with complete freedom; at will; as one pleases
如意輪観音: (にょいりんかんのん) - Cintamani-cakra (manifestation of Avalokitesvara)
如才ない: (じょさいない) - tactful; shrewd; cautious; clever; smart; adroit
如才無い: (じょさいない) - tactful; shrewd; cautious; clever; smart; adroit
如是: (にょぜ) - ("like this"; often the opening word of a sutra); ten thusnesses (in Tendai)
如是我聞: (にょぜがもん) - (yoji) thus I hear (quote from the sutras); these ears have heard
如月: (じょげつ) - second month of the lunar calendar
如来: (にょらい) - Tathagata; perfected one (suffix of high-ranking Buddhist deities)
如来禅: (にょらいぜん) - Zen Buddhism based on the original teachings of Buddha
如来蔵: (にょらいぞう) - tathagatagarbha (buddha-womb, the potential within all living things to become a buddha)
如法: (にょほう) - observance of the Buddha's teachings
如雨露: (じょろ) - watering can; watering pot; sprinkling can
如露: (じょろ) - watering can; watering pot; sprinkling can
如露亦如電: (にょろやくにょでん) - like dew or lightning, gone in a flash
如露如電: (にょろにょでん) - (yoji)  existence (as we percieve it) is as mutable and incorporeal as is the morning dew or a flash of lightning
妃殿下: (ひでんか) - princess; Her Royal Highness
妄り: (みだり) - selfish/with disregard for order or rules; reckless/rash/careless; loose/bawdy; irrational/illogical
妄りに: (みだりに) - without authority; without reason/unnecessarily; recklessly/indiscriminately/arbitrarily
妄信: (もうしん) - blind acceptance; blind belief; credulity
妄執: (moushuu) - delírio profundamente enraizado, convicção firme (baseada em crenças incorretas)
妄心: (もうじん) - deluded mind (a mind polluted with klesha, incapable of understanding the original essence of things)
妄念: (もうねん) - conviction based on flawed ideas; obstructive thought
妄挙: (ぼうきょ) - unreasonable actions; lack of discrimination
妄言: (もうげん) - reckless remark; rash remark; abusive language; thoughtless words
妄言多謝: (ぼうげんたしゃ) - (yoji) Kindly excuse my reckless remarks; Please excuse my thoughtless words. (used deferentially, in a letter, etc.)
妄評: (もうひょう) - unfair criticism; abusive remarks
妄語戒: (もうごかい) - do not speak untruthfully (precept)
妊む: (はらむ) - to conceive/to become pregnant; to get filled with (e.g. sails filled with wind)/to be swollen with; to contain (e.g. contradiction or danger); to be swollen and ripe (of a plant ear, head, or sprout)
妊娠中毒症: (にんしんちゅうどくしょう) - toxemia of pregnancy
妊娠中絶: (にんしんちゅうぜつ) - abortion; pregnancy termination
妊娠悪阻: (にんしんあそ) - {med} hyperemesis gravidarum; HG; severe morning sickness
妊娠時: (にんしんじ) - during pregnancy; while pregnant
妊娠検査薬: (にんしんけんさやく) - pregnancy test kit; pregnancy test
妊娠糖尿病: (にんしんとうにょうびょう) - gestational diabetes; gestational diabetes mellitus; pregnancy diabetes
妊娠線: (にんしんせん) - pregnancy stretch mark; striae gravidarum
妊産婦: (にんさんぷ) - expectant and nursing mothers
妊産婦死亡率: (にんさんぷしぼうりつ) - {med} maternal mortality rate
妓夫: (ぎふ) - (ぎゅう is also written with the ateji 牛) pimp; brothel tout
妓生: (こしょう) - Korean female entertainer (kor: gi-saeng)
妖しい: (あやしい) - (怪しい only) suspicious/dubious/doubtful/dodgy/suspicious (referring to a potential amorous relation)/dangerous (e.g. financial situation)/ominous (e.g. weather)/strange/shady/fishy; charming/bewitching/mysterious
妖刀: (ようとう) - bewitched sword; magical sword; demon sword
妖力: (ようりき) - spirit power; magical power
妖怪: (youkai) - fantasma, aparição, espectro, fantasma, espectro, demônio, monstro, duende
